original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1)
analyzed: dhamma anuloma tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 1.18. Uppannattika
analyzed: uppanna ttika

original: Vibhaṅgavāra
analyzed: vibhaṅgavāra

original: Hetu
analyzed: hetu

original: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—uppannā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ
analyzed: uppannaḥ dhammaḥ uppannassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayo uppannāḥ hetū sampayuttakāna

original: khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe uppannā
analyzed: khandhānam citta samuṭṭhānānañca rūpānam hetu paccayena paccayaḥ paṭisandhi kkhaṇe uppannā

original: hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: hetū sampayuttakānam khandhānam kaṭattā ca rūpānam hetu paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Ārammaṇa
analyzed: ārammaṇa

original: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—uppannaṁ cakkhuṁ aniccato
analyzed: uppannaḥ dhammaḥ uppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayo uppannam cakkhum aniccato

original: dukkhato anattato vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi
analyzed: dukkhataḥ anattataḥ vipassati assādeti abhinandati tam ārabbha rāgaḥ uppajjati diṭṭhi

original: uppajjati, vicikicchā …pe… uddhaccaṁ …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati. Uppannaṁ sotaṁ …
analyzed: uppajjati vicikicchā pe uddhaccam pe domanassam uppajjati uppannam sotam

original: ghānaṁ … jivhaṁ … kāyaṁ … rūpe … sadde … gandhe … rase … phoṭṭhabbe … vatthuṁ … uppanne
analyzed: ghānam jivham kāyam rūpe sadde gandhe rase phoṭṭhabbe vatthum uppanne

original: khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati. Dibbena cakkhunā
analyzed: khandhe aniccataḥ dukkhataḥ anattataḥ vipassati pe domanassam uppajjati dibbena cakkhunā

original: rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti, rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe…
analyzed: rūpam passati dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddam suṇāti rūpa āyatanam cakkhu viññāṇassa pe

original: phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa …pe… uppannā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, āvajjanāya
analyzed: phoṭṭhabba āyatanam kāya viññāṇassa pe uppannā khandhāḥ iddhividha ñāṇassa āvajjanāya

original: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Anuppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—anuppanne rūpe …
analyzed: anuppannaḥ dhammaḥ uppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ anuppanne rūpe

original: sadde … gandhe … rase … phoṭṭhabbe … anuppanne khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato
analyzed: sadde gandhe rase phoṭṭhabbe anuppanne khandhe aniccataḥ dukkhataḥ anattataḥ

original: vipassati …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati. Anuppannā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa,
analyzed: vipassati pe domanassam uppajjati anuppannā khandhāḥ iddhividha ñāṇassa cetas pariya ñāṇassa

original: anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: anāgata sañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇa paccayena paccayo

original: Uppādī dhammo uppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—uppādiṁ cakkhuṁ …pe…
analyzed: uppādī dhammaḥ uppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayouppādim cakkhum pe

original: kāyaṁ … rūpe … gandhe … rase … phoṭṭhabbe … vatthuṁ … uppādī khandhe aniccato dukkhato
analyzed: kāyam rūpe gandhe rase phoṭṭhabbe vatthum uppādī khandhe aniccataḥ dukkhataḥ

original: anattato …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati. Uppādī khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa,
analyzed: anattataḥ pe domanassam uppajjati uppādī khandhāḥ iddhividha ñāṇassa cetopariya ñāṇassa

original: anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: anāgata sañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇa paccayena paccayo

original: Adhipati
analyzed: adhipati

original: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
analyzed: uppannaḥ dhammaḥ uppannassa dhammassa adhipati paccayena paccayaḥ ārammaṇa adhipati sahajāta adhipati

original: Ārammaṇādhipati—uppannaṁ cakkhuṁ garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā
analyzed: ārammaṇa adhipati uppannam cakkhum garum katvā assādeti abhinandati tam garum katvā

original: rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. Uppannaṁ sotaṁ … ghānaṁ … jivhaṁ … kāyaṁ … rūpe
analyzed: rāgaḥ uppajjati diṭṭhi uppajjati uppannam sotam ghānam jivham kāyam rūpe

original: … sadde … gandhe … rase … phoṭṭhabbe … vatthuṁ … uppanne khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti
analyzed: sadde gandhe rase phoṭṭhabbe vatthum uppanne khandhe garum katvā assādeti

original: abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati …pe…. Sahajātādhipati—uppannā adhipati
analyzed: abhinandati tam garum katvā rāgaḥ uppajjati pe sahajāta adhipati uppannāḥ adhipati

original: sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: sampayuttakānam khandhānam citta samuṭṭhānānañca rūpānam adhipati paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Anuppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇādhipati—anuppanne
analyzed: anuppannaḥ dhammaḥ uppannassa dhammassa adhipati paccayena paccayaḥ ārammaṇa adhipati anuppanne

original: rūpe … sadde … gandhe … rase … phoṭṭhabbe … anuppanne khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti
analyzed: rūpe sadde gandhe rase phoṭṭhabbe anuppanne khandhe garum katvā assādeti

original: abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
analyzed: abhinandati tam garum katvā rāgaḥ uppajjati diṭṭhi uppajjati

original: Uppādī dhammo uppannassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇādhipati—uppādiṁ
analyzed: uppādī dhammaḥ uppannassa dhammassa adhipati paccayena paccayaḥ ārammaṇa adhipati uppādi

original: cakkhuṁ …pe… kāyaṁ … rūpe …pe… phoṭṭhabbe … vatthuṁ … uppādī khandhe garuṁ katvā
analyzed: cakkhum pe kāyam rūpe pe phoṭṭhabbe vatthum uppādī khandhe garum katvā

original: assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
analyzed: assādeti abhinandati tam garum katvā rāgaḥ uppajjati diṭṭhi uppajjati

original: Sahajāta
analyzed: sahajāta

original: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo—uppanno eko khandho
analyzed: uppannaḥ dhammaḥ uppannassa dhammassa sahajāta paccayena paccayo uppannaḥ ekaḥ khandho

original: tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ sahajātapaccayena paccayo …pe…
analyzed: tiṇṇannam khandhānam citta samuṭṭhānānaṃ ca rūpānam sahajāta paccayena paccayaḥ pe

original: dve khandhā dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: dve khandhāḥ dvinnam khandhānam citta samuṭṭhānānam ca rūpānam sahajāta paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe uppanno eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ sahajātapaccayena
analyzed: paṭisandhi khaṇe uppannaḥ ekaḥ khandhaḥ tiṇṇannam khandhānam kaṭattā ca rūpānam sahajāta paccayena

original: paccayo …pe… dve khandhā dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ sahajātapaccayena
analyzed: paccayaḥ pe dve khandhāḥ dvinnam khandhānam kaṭattā ca rūpānam sahajāta paccayena

original: paccayo. Khandhā vatthussa sahajātapaccayena paccayo. Vatthu khandhānaṁ sahajātapaccayena
analyzed: paccayaḥ khandhāḥ vatthussa sahajāta paccayena paccayaḥ vatthu khandhānam sahajāta paccayena

original: paccayo. Ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ tiṇṇannaṁ mahābhūtānaṁ sahajātapaccayena paccayo …pe… dve
analyzed: paccayaḥ ekam mahābhūtam tiṇṇannam mahābhūtānam sahajāta paccayena paccayaḥ pe dve

original: mahābhūtā …pe… mahābhūtā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ kaṭattārūpānaṁ upādārūpānaṁ sahajātapaccayena
analyzed: mahābhūtā pe mahābhūtā citta samuṭṭhānānam rūpānam kaṭattā rūpānam upādā rūpānam sahajāta paccayena

original: paccayo. bāhiraṁ … āhārasamuṭṭhānaṁ … utusamuṭṭhānaṁ … asaññasattānaṁ ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ
analyzed: paccayaḥ bāhiram āhāra samuṭṭhānam utu samuṭṭhānam asaññasattānam ekam mahābhūta

original: …pe… dve mahābhūtā …pe… mahābhūtā kaṭattārūpānaṁ upādārūpānaṁ sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: pe dve mahābhūtā pe mahābhūtā kaṭattā rūpānaṃ upādā rūpānaṃ sahajāta paccayena paccayo

original: Aññamañña
analyzed: aññamañña

original: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa aññamaññapaccayena paccayo—uppanno eko khandho
analyzed: uppannaḥ dhammaḥ uppannassa dhammassa aññamañña paccayena paccayaḥ uppannaḥ ekaḥ khandho

original: tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ aññamaññapaccayena paccayo …pe… dve khandhā …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe
analyzed: tiṇṇannam khandhānam aññamañña paccayena paccayaḥ pe dve khandhā pe paṭisandhi kkhaṇe

original: uppanno eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ vatthussa ca aññamaññapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: uppannaḥ ekaḥ khandho tiṇṇannam khandhānam vatthussa ca aññamañña paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Dve khandhā …pe… khandhā vatthussa aññamaññapaccayena paccayo. Vatthu khandhānaṁ
analyzed: dve khandhā pe khandhā vatthussa aññamañña paccayena paccayaḥ vatthu khandhāna

original: aññamaññapaccayena paccayo. Ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe… bāhiraṁ … āhārasamuṭṭhānaṁ … utusamuṭṭhānaṁ
analyzed: aññamañña paccayena paccayaḥ ekam mahābhūtam pe bāhiram āhāra samuṭṭhānam utu samuṭṭhāna

original: … asaññasattānaṁ ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ tiṇṇannaṁ mahābhūtānaṁ aññamaññapaccayena paccayo
analyzed: asaññasattānam ekam mahābhūtam tiṇṇannam mahābhūtānam aññamañña paccayena paccayaḥ

original: …pe… dve mahābhūtā …pe….
analyzed: pe dve mahābhūtā pe

original: Nissaya
analyzed: nissaya

original: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa nissayapaccayena paccayo—uppanno eko khandho
analyzed: uppannaḥ dhammaḥ uppannassa dhammassa nissaya paccayena paccayo uppannaḥ ekaḥ khandho

original: tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ nissayapaccayena paccayo …pe… dve
analyzed: tiṇṇannam khandhānam citta samuṭṭhānānaṃ ca rūpānaṃ nissaya paccayena paccayaḥ pe dve

original: khandhā …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe… khandhā vatthussa …pe… vatthu khandhānaṁ …pe…
analyzed: khandhā pe paṭisandhikkhaṇe pe khandhā vatthussa pe vatthu khandhānam pe

original: ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe… bāhiraṁ … āhārasamuṭṭhānaṁ … utusamuṭṭhānaṁ … asaññasattānaṁ
analyzed: ekam mahābhūtam pe bāhiram āhāra samuṭṭhānam utu samuṭṭhānam

original: ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe… mahābhūtā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ kaṭattārūpānaṁ upādārūpānaṁ
analyzed: ekam mahābhūtam pe mahābhūtā citta samuṭṭhānānam rūpānam kaṭattā rūpānam upādā rūpānam

original: cakkhāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe… kāyāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa …pe… vatthu uppannānaṁ
analyzed: cakkhu āyatanam cakkhu viññāṇassa pe kāya āyatanam kāya viññāṇassa pe vatthu uppannāna

original: khandhānaṁ nissayapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: khandhānam nissaya paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Upanissaya
analyzed: upanissaya

original: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
analyzed: uppannaḥ dhammaḥ uppannassa dhammassa upanissaya paccayena paccayaḥ ārammaṇa upanissayaḥ

original: pakatūpanissayo …pe…. Pakatūpanissayo—uppannaṁ utuṁ upanissāya jhānaṁ uppādeti, vipassanaṁ
analyzed: pakatu upanissayaḥ pe pakatu upanissayaḥ uppannam utum upanissāya jhānam uppādeti vipassana

original: …pe… maggaṁ …pe… abhiññaṁ …pe… samāpattiṁ uppādeti, mānaṁ jappeti, diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti.
analyzed: pe maggam pe abhiññam pe samāpattim uppādeti mānam jappeti diṭṭhim gaṇhāti

original: Uppannaṁ bhojanaṁ …pe… senāsanaṁ upanissāya jhānaṁ uppādeti vipassanaṁ …pe… maggaṁ
analyzed: uppannam bhojanam pe senāsanam upanissāya jhānam uppādeti vipassanam pe magga

original: …pe… abhiññaṁ …pe… samāpattiṁ uppādeti, mānaṁ jappeti, diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti. Uppannaṁ
analyzed: pe abhiññam pe samāpattim uppādeti mānam jappeti diṭṭhim gaṇhāti uppanna

original: utu … bhojanaṁ … senāsanaṁ uppannāya saddhāya …pe… paññāya, kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa
analyzed: utu bhojanam senāsanam uppannāya saddhāya pe paññāya kāyikassa sukhassa kāyikassa

original: dukkhassa, maggassa, phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: dukkhassa maggassa phala samāpattiyāḥ upanissaya paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Anuppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
analyzed: anuppannaḥ dhammaḥ uppannassa dhammassa upanissaya paccayena paccayaḥ ārammaṇa upanissayaḥ

original: pakatūpanissayo …pe…. Pakatūpanissayo—anuppannaṁ vaṇṇasampadaṁ patthayamāno dānaṁ
analyzed: pakata upanissayaḥ pe pakata upanissayaḥ anuppannam vaṇṇa sampadam patthayamānaḥ dāna

original: deti, sīlaṁ samādiyati, uposathakammaṁ karoti. Anuppannaṁ saddasampadaṁ … gandhasampadaṁ
analyzed: deti sīlam samādiyati uposatha kammam karoti anuppannam sadda sampadam gandha sampada

original: … rasasampadaṁ … phoṭṭhabbasampadaṁ … anuppanne khandhe patthayamāno dānaṁ deti,
analyzed: rasa sampadam phoṭṭhabba sampadam anuppanne khandhe patthayamānaḥ dānam deti

original: sīlaṁ samādiyati, uposathakammaṁ karoti. Anuppannā vaṇṇasampadā …pe… anuppannā khandhā
analyzed: sīlam samādiyati uposatha kammam karoti anuppannā vaṇṇa sampadā pe anuppannā khandhā

original: uppannāya saddhāya …pe… paññāya, kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa, maggassa,
analyzed: uppannāya saddhāya pe paññāya kāyikassa sukhassa kāyikassa dukkhassa maggassa

original: phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: phala samāpattiyāḥ upanissaya paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Uppādī dhammo uppannassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
analyzed: uppādī dhammaḥ uppannassa dhammassa upanissaya paccayena paccayaḥ ārammaṇa upanissayaḥ

original: pakatūpanissayo …pe…. Pakatūpanissayo—uppādiṁ cakkhusampadaṁ patthayamāno dānaṁ deti,
analyzed: pakatu upanissayaḥ pe pakatu upanissaya uppādim cakkhu sampadam patthayamānaḥ dānam deti

original: sīlaṁ samādiyati, uposathakammaṁ karoti. Uppādiṁ sotasampadaṁ …pe… kāyasampadaṁ …pe…
analyzed: sīlam samādiyati uposatha kammam karoti uppādim sota sampadam pe kāya sampadam pe

original: vaṇṇasampadaṁ … gandhasampadaṁ … rasasampadaṁ … phoṭṭhabbasampadaṁ … uppādī khandhe
analyzed: vaṇṇa sampadam gandha sampadam rasa sampadam phoṭṭhabba sampadam uppādī khandhe

original: patthayamāno dānaṁ deti, sīlaṁ samādiyati, uposathakammaṁ karoti. Uppādī cakkhusampadā
analyzed: patthayamānaḥ dānam deti sīlam samādiyati uposatha kammam karoti uppādī cakkhu sampadā

original: …pe… kāyasampadā … vaṇṇasampadā …pe… phoṭṭhabbasampadā … uppādī khandhā uppannāya
analyzed: pe kāya sampadā vaṇṇa sampadā pe phoṭṭhabba sampadā uppādī khandhāḥ uppannāya

original: saddhāya …pe… paññāya, kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa, maggassa, phalasamāpattiyā
analyzed: saddhāya pe paññāya kāyikassa sukhassa kāyikassa dukkhassa maggassa phala samāpattiyā

original: upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: upanissaya paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Purejāta
analyzed: purā jāta

original: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,
analyzed: uppannaḥ dhammaḥ uppannassa dhammassa purejāta paccayena paccayaḥ ārammaṇa purejāta

original: vatthupurejātaṁ. Ārammaṇapurejātaṁ—cakkhuṁ …pe… vatthuṁ aniccato dukkhato anattato
analyzed: vatthu purejātaḥ ārammaṇa purejāta cakkhum pe vatthum aniccataḥ dukkhataḥ anattataḥ

original: vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati
analyzed: vipassati assādeti abhinandati tam ārabbha rāgaḥ uppajjati pe domanassam uppajjati

original: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti, rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa
analyzed: dibbena cakkhunā rūpam passati dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddam suṇāti rūpa āyatanam cakkhu viññāṇassa

original: …pe… phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa purejātapaccayena paccayo. Vatthupurejātaṁ—cakkhāyatanaṁ
analyzed: pe phoṭṭhabba āyatanam kāya viññāṇassa purejāta paccayena paccayaḥ vatthu purejāta cakkhu āyatana

original: cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe… vatthu uppannānaṁ khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: cakkhu viññāṇassa pe vatthu uppannānam khandhānam purejāta paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Pacchājāta
analyzed: pacchājāta

original: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo—pacchājātā uppannā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: uppannaḥ dhammaḥ uppannassa dhammassa pacchājāta paccayena paccaya upacchājātāḥ uppannāḥ khandhāḥ purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājāta paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Kamma
analyzed: kamma

original: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—uppannā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ
analyzed: uppannaḥ dhammaḥ uppannassa dhammassa kamma paccayena paccayaḥ uppannā cetanā

original: khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe
analyzed: khandhānam citta samuṭṭhānānaṃ ca rūpānam kamma paccayena paccayaḥ paṭisandhi kkhaṇe

original: uppannā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: uppannā cetanā sampayuttakānam khandhānam kaṭattā ca rūpānam kamma paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Vipāka
analyzed: vipāka

original: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo—vipāko uppanno eko khandho
analyzed: uppannaḥ dhammaḥ uppannassa dhammassa vipāka paccayena paccayaḥ vipākaḥ uppannaḥ ekaḥ khandho

original: tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ vipākapaccayena paccayo …pe… dve
analyzed: tiṇṇannam khandhānam citta samuṭṭhānānañca rūpānam vipāka paccayena paccayaḥ pe dve

original: khandhā …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe uppanno eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca
analyzed: khandhāḥ pe paṭisandhi kkhaṇe uppannaḥ ekaḥ khandho tiṇṇannam khandhānam kaṭattā ca

original: rūpānaṁ …pe… dve khandhā …pe… khandhā vatthussa vipākapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: rūpānam pe dve khandhāḥ pe khandhāḥ vatthussa vipāka paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Āhāra
analyzed: āhāra

original: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—uppannā āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ
analyzed: uppannaḥ dhammaḥ uppannassa dhammassa āhāra paccayena paccayo uppannāḥ āhārāḥ sampayuttakāna

original: khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe
analyzed: khandhānam citta samuṭṭhānānaṃ ca rūpānaṃ āhāra paccayena paccayaḥ paṭisandhi kkhaṇe

original: …pe…. Kabaḷīkāro āhāro—imassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: pe kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa āhāra paccayena paccayo

original: Indriya
analyzed: indriya

original: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—uppannā indriyā sampayuttakānaṁ
analyzed: uppannaḥ dhammaḥ uppannassa dhammassa indriya paccayena paccayo uppannāḥ indriyāḥ sampayuttakāna

original: khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe
analyzed: khandhānam citta samuṭṭhānānaṃ ca rūpānaṃ indriya paccayena paccayaḥ paṭisandhi kkhaṇe

original: …pe… cakkhundriyaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe… kāyindriyaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa …pe… rūpajīvitindriyaṁ
analyzed: pe cakkhu indriyam cakkhu viññāṇassa pe kāyindriyam kāya viññāṇassa pe rūpa jīvitindriya

original: kaṭattārūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: indriya paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Jhānādi
analyzed: jhāna ādi

original: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa jhānapaccayena paccayo … maggapaccayena paccayo
analyzed: uppannaḥ dhammaḥ uppannassa dhammassa jhāna paccayena paccayaḥ magga paccayena paccayaḥ

original: … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ,
analyzed: sampayutta paccayena paccayaḥ vippayutta paccayena paccayaḥ sahajāta purejāta

original: pacchājātaṁ. Sahajātā—uppannā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena
analyzed: pacchājāta sahajāta auppannā khandhā citta samuṭṭhānānam rūpānam vippayutta paccayena

original: paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe uppannā khandhā kaṭattārūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: paccayaḥ paṭisandhi kkhaṇe uppannā khandhā kaṭattā rūpānam vippayutta paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Khandhā vatthussa, vatthu khandhānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Purejātaṁ—cakkhāyatanaṁ
analyzed: khandhāḥ vatthussa vatthu khandhānam vippayutta paccayena paccayaḥ purejāta cakkhāyatana

original: cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe… kāyāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa … vatthu uppannānaṁ khandhānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena
analyzed: cakkhu viññāṇassa pe kāya āyatanam kāya viññāṇassa vatthu uppannānam khandhānam vippayutta paccayena

original: paccayo. Pacchājātā—uppannā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: paccayaḥ pacchājāta auppannā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayutta paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Atthi
analyzed: atthi

original: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ,
analyzed: uppannaḥ dhammaḥ uppannassa dhammassa atthi paccayena paccayo sahajāta purejāta

original: pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ. Sahajāto—uppanno eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ
analyzed: pacchājātaḥ āhāraḥ indriya sahajāta uppannaḥ ekaḥ khandho tiṇṇannam khandhānam

original: cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe… dve khandhā …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe
analyzed: citta samuṭṭhānānaṃ ca rūpānaṃ atthi paccayena paccayaḥ pe dve khandhā pe paṭisandhi kkhaṇe

original: …pe… ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe… bāhiraṁ … āhārasamuṭṭhānaṁ … utusamuṭṭhānaṁ … asaññasattānaṁ
analyzed: pe ekam mahābhūtam pe bāhiram āhāra samuṭṭhānam utu samuṭṭhānam

original: …pe…. Purejātaṁ—cakkhuṁ aniccato …pe… vatthuṁ aniccato …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati,
analyzed: pe purejāta cakkhum aniccatas pe vatthum aniccatas pe domanassam uppajjati

original: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotudhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti, rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa
analyzed: dibbena cakkhunā rūpam passati dibbāya sotu dhātuyā saddam suṇāti rūpa āyatanam cakkhu viññāṇassa

original: …pe… phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa atthipaccayena paccayo. Cakkhāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa
analyzed: pe phoṭṭhabba āyatanam kāya viññāṇassa atthi paccayena paccayaḥ cakkhu āyatanam cakkhu viññāṇassa

original: …pe… kāyāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa …pe… vatthu uppannānaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena
analyzed: pe kāya āyatanam kāya viññāṇassa pe vatthu uppannānam khandhānam atthi paccayena

original: paccayo. Pacchājātā—uppannā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: paccayaḥ pacchājāta auppannā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthi paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Kabaḷīkāro āhāro—imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. Rūpajīvitindriyaṁ—kaṭattārūpānaṁ
analyzed: kabaḷīkāraḥ āhāraḥ imassa kāyassa atthi paccayena paccayo

original: atthipaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: atthi paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Avigata
analyzed: avigata

original: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa avigatapaccayena paccayo …pe….
analyzed: uppannaḥ dhammaḥ uppannassa dhammassa avigata paccayena paccayaḥ pe

original: Saṅkhyāvāra
analyzed: saṅkhyāvāra

original: Suddha
analyzed: suddha

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi, sahajāte ekaṁ, aññamaññe ekaṁ, nissaye
analyzed: hetuyā eka ārammaṇe tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi sahajāte eka aññamaññe eka nissaye

original: ekaṁ, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte ekaṁ, pacchājāte kamme vipāke āhāre indriye jhāne
analyzed: eka upanissaye tīṇi purejāte eka pacchājāte kamme vipāke āhāre indriye jhāne

original: magge sampayutte vippayutte atthiyā avigate ekaṁ. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
analyzed: magge sampayutte vippayutte atthiyāḥ avigate ekaḥ evam gaṇetabba

original: Anulomaṁ.
analyzed: anuloma

original: Paccanīyuddhāra
analyzed: paccanīya uddhāra

original: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena
analyzed: uppannaḥ dhammaḥ uppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ sahajāta paccayena

original: paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena
analyzed: paccayo upanissaya paccayena paccayo purejāta paccayena paccayo pacchājāta paccayena

analyzed: paccayaḥ āhāra paccayena paccayaḥ indriya paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Anuppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: anuppannaḥ dhammaḥ uppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ upanissaya paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Uppādī dhammo uppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: uppādī dhammaḥ uppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ upanissaya paccayena paccayaḥ

original: 1.18.7.2. Paccayapaccanīya
analyzed: paccaya paccanīya

original: Saṅkhyāvāra
analyzed: saṅkhyāvāra

original: Suddha
analyzed: suddha

original: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… navippayutte tīṇi, noatthiyā dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi, noavigate dve. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetuyā tīṇi na ārammaṇe tīṇi na adhipatiyā tīṇi pe na vippayutte tīṇi no atthiyā dve no natthiyā tīṇi no vigate tīṇi no avigate dve evam gaṇetabba

original: Paccanīyaṁ.
analyzed: paccanīya

analyzed: paccaya anuloma paccanīya

analyzed: hetu paccayā na ārammaṇe ekam pe no natthiyāḥ no vigate eka

original: Anulomapaccanīyaṁ.
analyzed: anuloma paccanīya

original: 1.18.7.4. Paccanīyānuloma
analyzed: paccanīya anuloma

original: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi, sahajāte ekaṁ, aññamaññe ekaṁ, nissaye
analyzed: na hetu paccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi sahajāte eka aññamaññe eka nissaye

original: ekaṁ, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte ekaṁ, pacchājāte ekaṁ, kamme vipāke āhāre indriye
analyzed: eka upanissaye tīṇi purejāte eka pacchājāte eka kamme vipāke āhāre indriye

analyzed: jhāne magge sampayutte vippayutte atthiyā avigate eka

analyzed: paccanīya anuloma
